info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 18 at 7:52PM PDT until July 22 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM SATURDAY... * WHAT...Highs of 100 to 105 degrees Wednesday, increasing to highs of 105 to 110 degrees Thursday through Saturday. * WHERE...The Inland Empire. * WHEN...Until 8 PM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.
